name: YUME Demo
description:
Another unassuming indie RPG where a child WAY too young to be exploring on their own... goes, well, exploring on their own... and maybe discovers they've been living a lie.

All alongside the comfort of dear strangers!

All creds are in the README, so be sure to actually read it!

Dev Note: Had to fix a completely game-breaking oversight. If your folder is called "DEMO 1.1", you have the right one! If not, please download the new one!
